content: I am a Computer Science Graduate, I completed my studies at the University of Wollongong. I have a very strong interest in automation, server/system administration, NGINX, Docker, Open Source Software, React.js and the Node.js runtime.
title: About Me

content: Career Objective Statement Participate and contribute to beneficial services that will impact the community through permanent Information Technology solutions, strategies and programs.
title: About Me

content: Skillset I am vastly proficient in a large number of technologies. My career has allowed me to focus on the following areas, primarily Server/System Administration, Web Development and the use of Docker.  Outstanding Docker Proficiency.  Vast understanding of Virtual Networking.  This website is proudly using Cloudflare DNS.  SSL Let’s Encrypt with Traefik.  Website Load Balancing & Reverse Proxy Configuration.  Excellent understanding of DHCP & Active Directory.  Experience with Zscaler SSL Inspection and Bypassing.   Detailed knowledge of JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, HTML5, CSS, Python, Django, C++, Bash/Powershell & GitHub/Git.
title: About Me

content: Projects   All of my projects are on my GitHub Profile.   Please view the Projects section of my website to view my detailed write-ups about the new things in my life, and the technologies I’ve been exploring.
title: About Me
